title: Convert to Exponential Form
text: We know that we're trying to solve $$ln(x)=7$$. Rewrite this expression first into exponential form. Remember that the base for ln functions is e.

title: Determing the Exponential Form
text: What is the exponential form of $$ln(x)=7$$?

title: Solve for x
text: What is the solution for x in the exponential equation $$e^7=x$$?
